org.araneaframework.uilib.util
Class MessageUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.util.MessageUtil

public class MessageUtil
extends Object

Contains various useful methods to localize, format and create link messages.

Method Detail

localize

public static String localize(String messageCode,
                              Environment env)
Localizes a message that does not require any parameter.

Parameters:
messageCode - The code to retrieve the message.
env - The environment that is expected to contain the localization context.
Returns:
The localized message.

format

public static String format(String message,
                            Object... parameters)
Formats the localized message by inserting given parameters to the placeholders in the message.

Parameters:
message - The message containing placeholders for the parameters.
parameters - The parameters that will be used in the message.
Returns:
The formatted message.

localizeAndFormat

public static String localizeAndFormat(Environment env,
                                       String message,
                                       Object... parameters)
Localizes and then formats the localized message by inserting given parameters to the placeholders.

Parameters:
message - The key to retrieve the message.
parameters - The parameters that will be used in the localized message.
env - The environment that is expected to contain the localization context.
Returns:
The localized and formatted message.

createEventMessage

public static String createEventMessage(Environment env,
                                        String eventId,
                                        String eventParam,
                                        String widgetFullId,
                                        String message,
                                        Object... params)
Returns HTML code for wrapping the message in a link to invoke an event. The event is described by event ID (that refers to the event handler), optional event parameter, and the runtime full widget ID (to deliver the event to the right widget).
Note that the message should be rendered as-is (not escaped).

Parameters:
env - The environment that is expected to contain the localization context.
eventId - The ID of the event to be invoked.
eventParam - The parameter for the event.
widgetFullId - The full ID of the event widget.
message - The key to retrieve and localize the message.
params - The parameters for the localized message.
Returns:
The HTML code that contains a link.
Since:
1.1.4

createEventMessage

public static String createEventMessage(String eventId,
                                        String eventParam,
                                        Widget targetWidget,
                                        String localizedMessage)
Returns HTML code for wrapping the message in a link to invoke an event. The event is described by event ID (that refers to the event handler), optional event parameter, and the runtime full widget ID (to deliver the event to the right widget).
Note that the message should be rendered as-is (not escaped).

Parameters:
eventId - The ID of the event to be invoked.
eventParam - The parameter for the event.
targetWidget - The widget that can handle the event (the widget must have its scope).
localizedMessage - The localized message.
Returns:
The HTML code that contains a link.
Since:
1.1.4

createEventMessage

public static String createEventMessage(String eventId,
                                        String eventParam,
                                        String widgetFullId,
                                        String localizedMessage)
Returns HTML code for wrapping the message in a link to invoke an event. The event is described by event ID (that refers to the event handler), optional event parameter, and the runtime full widget ID (to deliver the event to the right widget).
Note that the message should be rendered as-is (not escaped).

Parameters:
localizedMessage - The localized message.
eventId - The ID of the event to be invoked.
eventParam - The parameter for the event.
widgetFullId - The full ID of the event widget.
Returns:
The HTML code that contains a link.
Since:
1.1.4

createEventMessage

public static String createEventMessage(String localizedMessage,
                                        UiEvent event)
Returns HTML code for wrapping the message in a link to invoke an event. The event is described by event ID (that refers to the event handler), optional event parameter, and the runtime full widget ID (to deliver the event to the right widget).
Note that the message should be rendered as-is (not escaped).

Parameters:
localizedMessage - The localized message.
event - The event information.
Returns:
The HTML code that contains a link.
Since:
1.1.4
